about_the_game:
Zombie Panic! Source Official Soundtrack by KillahMo and KaempeLaeske introduces you 27 different types of music from the memorable standalone modification Zombie Panic! Source.

The original soundtrack was composed by Erik Grant (AKA KillahMo) and released on Dec 28, 2007. Then our latest sound designer, KaempeLaeske, created three new soundtracks to our newest maps shipped on ZPS v3.0 (Frozenheart, Work Hazard, and Zomboeing); which was released on Dec 8, 2017.
